thread.section_title: Shipito Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shipito | www.shipito.com
thread.title: segun Raphy

author: segun Raphy
title: segun Raphy
text:
Hello
I asked shipito to consolidate my package the 10$ was charge, later they asked the send my id cards and to fill form 1583 which I did and send the three id cards instead of one yet shipito refused to unblocked my account. I sent several emails not reply. I call customer service care she keep on say the samething. Am tired with them. I don't the next thing to do. Are they want to scam me or what. Any help that I have to get them ship my package i will appreciate it.
